definition: a harsh hoarse utterance (as of a frog), to pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
details:
noun
- a harsh hoarse utterance (as of a frog)
= synonyms: croaking
verb
- to pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
= synonyms: choke
- to make complaining remarks or noises under one's breath
= synonyms: murmur
- to utter a hoarse sound, like a raven
= synonyms: cronk
